credentials.title: Login
credentials.signupBtn: Don't yet have an account? Sign up.

verificationCode.title: Verify your identity
verificationCode.info: Please enter the six digit code we have sent to your email address. If you cannot find it in your inbox, please also check the SPAM folder or send a new code with the button below.

errors.accountOrPassword: Something has gone wrong. Check your email address and password.
errors.wrongCode: Wrong code. Check the code we emailed you.
errors.newCodeSent: Wrong code. We have emailed you a new code.
errors.rateLimit: You will need to wait a while before you can request a new code.
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.loginLink: Have an account already? Login in here.
signup.reCaptchaLinks: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <1>Privacy Policy</1> and <3>Terms of Service</3> apply.

errors.passwordRules: Your password must have at least 8 characters and contain 3 of the following 4 elements: lowercase letters, capital letters, numbers, punctuation marks.
errors.passwordMatch: The passwords are not the same
errors.invalidEmail: Your email address seems to be incorrect

signupSuccess.title: Welcome!
signupSuccess.successMsg:
You are almost signed up for Infectieradar.be! 

 First confirm your email address by clicking on the link in the confirmation email that we have sent you 
 If you can’t find the email, first check your spam folder. You can also request a new email below.
signupSuccess.wrongEmailBtn: Did you use the wrong email address? Then change it here.

passwordForgotten.title: Change password
passwordForgotten.info: Enter the email address of your account
passwordForgotten.successMessage:
Follow the link in the email we have sent you at the address below.
 If you haven’t received an email, check your spam folder or try again if possible.

errors.invalidId: Something has gone wrong. Check your email address or connection./n You can have another try when the button is visible again.
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.

changeEmail.title: Change email address
changeEmail.info: Do you want to use a different email address? Change your email address by clicking on the button below. Note: you cannot log back in to Infectieradar.be until you have confirmed the email address.

errors.wrongPasswordOrAccountId: Something has gone wrong. Check your information. (email address or password may be wrong)
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.

warningDialog.title: Confirm new email address
warningDialog.content: Note: you cannot log back in to Infectieradar.be until you have confirmed the new email address via the link in the confirmation email that we have sent you.

successDialog.title: Email address changed
successDialog.content: Success! Your email address has been changed.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.info: For security reasons, you must first provide your current password.

errors.passwordRules: Your password must have at least 8 characters and contain 3 of the following 4 elements: lowercase letters, capital letters, numbers, punctuation marks.
errors.passwordMatch: The passwords are not the same
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.

successDialog.title: Password changed
successDialog.content: Success! Your password has been changed

warningDialog.title: Delete profile
warningDialog.content: The removal of the profile {{ alias }} cannot be undone.

editProfile.consentCheckboxText: You may only create a profile and complete questionnaires for yourself or as a parent or legal representative of your child who has not yet reached the age of 18

changeLanguage.title: Languages
changeLanguage.info: You can change the default language here. If availble, also emails will be send in this language.

errors.emtyLanguages: Failed to load languages. Please try again later
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.

successDialog.title: Language changed
successDialog.content: Success! The default language has changed.

changeNotifications.title: Email settings
changeNotifications.info: You can opt to stop receiving the weekly reminder email or the newsletter.

weeklyReminder.label: Weekly reminder email
weeklyReminder.on: I would like to receive the weekly reminder email
weeklyReminder.off: Don't receive the weekly reminder email

newsletter.label: Email to all participants. Sometimes it will be necessary to send an email to all participants with information about the study.
newsletter.on: I would like to receive these emails to all participants
newsletter.off: Don’t receive these emails to all participants

successDialog.title: Settings are changed
successDialog.content: Done! Your email setting are changed.

deleteAccount.title: Withdraw from study
deleteAccount.info:
Are you sure you want to delete your account? 
This action cannot be undone.

successDialog.title: Account deleted
successDialog.content: Done! Your account has been deleted. Thank you for your contribution. You can always participate again by creating a new account.
